Name: Turn the Line!
About the game: Turn the Line is a co-op tycoon game where 1~4 people play together. You will become Alex, a newcomer to Production Team 1. As Alex, your goal is to finish all orders on time and get off work. The Moon Factory is no easy-going place. There are no holidays, and you can't go home until all your work is completed. Use your skills to work together and give the bunnies the freedom to leave work on time! Various maps You will be facing a poor working condition at the Moon Factory. Inside the factory full of inconveniences and issues, you and your team members are the only ones to trust. You must overcome the poor working condition and complete all the tasks through personal skills and skillful co-op. You'll be facing more and more difficult situations. But don't worry, nothing is impossible for the bunnies as long as they can get off from work on time!
Meta Title: Turn the Line!: Mar 31, 2022, Megatent Inc. and Full Over...
